name: McLean Watson Capital
overview: McLean Watson Capital is a venture capital firm specializing in seed, early stage, mid stage, and late stage investments. The firm prefers to invest in information technology and communications sectors with a focus on hardware, internet, IT services, software, energy technology components, subsystems, and systems. It primarily invests in North America, Far East, Canada, and Asia region. The firm seeks to invest between $1 million and $5 million, which can go up to $15 million over the life of the investment. It prefers to take a seat on board and special committees of its portfolios. McLean Watson Capital was co-founded by Mr. John F. Eckert and Mr. Loudon Frank McLean Owen in 1992 is based in Toronto, Canada with an additional office in Singapore, Singapore.
